content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) containing water
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5) producing water
- Connected pipe groups for water transport
- Multiple electricity poles forming electricity group id=9766

### Iron Production Line
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0) with coal fuel
- Storage chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving items from drill to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving finished plates
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Secondary Iron Production Line
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0) with coal fuel
- Storage chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) moving items from drill to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5) moving finished plates
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining System
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) with coal fuel
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) moving items to assembler
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5) for automation science packs
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5) moving finished packs
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for item transport
- Lab for research consumption

### Copper Smelting
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (14.0, 14.0) with coal fuel

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Ensure storage chests contain the required items before attempting extraction
- Verify the correct chest positions when trying to extract items

### Fuel Management Errors
- Maintain adequate coal supplies for all burner devices
- Check fuel levels in mining drills, furnaces and inserters regularly
- Ensure boiler has constant fuel supply to maintain power generation

### Production Line Issues
- Monitor copper plate production and supply to prevent automation science pack production stoppages
- Keep input chests stocked with required materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels)

### Power System Issues
- Keep boiler fueled to maintain electricity supply
- Monitor steam engine operation and water supply

### Inventory Management
- Maintain sufficient coal reserves for refueling operations
- Balance resource distribution between different production lines
